name: Assassin Run 2D
description:
Assassin Run 2D is retro pixel puzzle action platformer game. The game rules is very simple, do not anyone let see you just stab them from behind or you lose. Become a deadly assassin and play through 30 challenging levels.

Gamepad Controls: Arrow keys or Left stick to move A button to jump or start game X button to attack View button to pause game B button to switch BGM Y button to switch SFX

Keyboard Controls: Arrow keys to move Z button to jump X button to attack
